properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
1. VESSEL BUCCANEER TAKING ON WATER AND CREW ABANDONING
   SHIP IN 21-37.43N 033-54.59W AT 140949Z JAN.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC DELGARDA,
   PHONE: 351 2962 81777, FAX: 351 2962 05239.
   E-MAIL: MRCC.DELGADA@GMAIL.COM.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 137/14.
